original_text: One Sabbath he was going through the grainfields, and as they made their way, his disciples began to pluck heads of grain.
korean_text: 안식일에 예수께서 밀밭 사이로 지나가실새 그의 제자들이 길을 열며 이삭을 자르니

sentences.original_text: One Sabbath he was going through the grainfields
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 안식일에 그가 곡식 밭을 지나가고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and as they made their way
his disciples began to pluck heads of grain.
